org.tribler.tsap.videoInfoScreen

Class VideoInfoFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • org.tribler.tsap.videoInfoScreen.VideoInfoFragment

  • public class VideoInfoFragment
extends Fragment
    Fragment that shows the detailed info belonging to the selected torrent in the thumb grid
    Author:
    Niels Spruit

    • Method Detail

      • onCreateView

        public View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater,
                         ViewGroup container,
                         Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Initializes the video info fragment's layout according to the selected torrent
        Parameters:
        inflater - The inflater used to inflate the video info layout
        container - The container view of this fragment
        savedInstanceState - The state of the saved instance
        Returns:
        The created view

      • setValues

        private void setValues()
        Changes the values of the views according to the torrent metadata

      • setViewButtonListener

        private void setViewButtonListener()
        Sets the listener of the 'Play video' button to a listener that starts VLC when the button is pressed

      • getCurrentTorrent

        private Torrent getCurrentTorrent()
        Returns the selected torrent
        Returns:
        The torrent with id=torrentID iff torrent with id=torrentID exists, otherwise torrent with id=0 is returned

      • loadBitmap

        private void loadBitmap(int resId,
                        ImageView mImageView)
        Loads the thumbnail of the selected torrent
        Parameters:
        resId - The resource id of the thumbnail
        mImageView - The ImageView in which the thumbnail should be loaded
